title: Negotiate Tenant Improvement Allowance
description: A prospective office tenant requires a significant build-out. The tenant's agent must negotiate a Tenant Improvement (TI) allowance from the landlord.

tasks.description: Obtain construction bids to estimate the cost of the tenant's desired office build-out.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a clear cost estimate for the build-out.

tasks.description: In the Letter of Intent (LOI), propose that the landlord provide a TI allowance of a specific amount per square foot.
tasks.expected_outcome: The LOI includes a formal request for a TI allowance.

tasks.description: Negotiate with the landlord's agent to reach an agreement on the final TI allowance amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: An agreed-upon TI allowance is included in the final lease terms.
